mapper.insert: insert into tbl_book_states (book_state_id, book_id, bar_code, state, borrow_number) values (#{bookStateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{borrowNumber,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.select: select book_state_id, book_id, bar_code, state, borrow_number from tbl_book_states
